title: RV Park, includes Utilities, High Speed Wi-Fi, Monthly
posting_body: The Redwood Lodge, is offering Long term RV and Tiny Home spaces in Tucumcari, NM - Monthly.
Only steps away from Mesalands Community College, The Redwood Lodge is a Family-owned, Small (11 spaces) and Intimate park with Trees, in a Safe and Quiet part of town.
We only offer Monthly stays so there is no noise and disruption from RV's coming in and out nightly.
We have a Manager on Site.
Includes Utilities, High-Speed Fiber Optic Wi-Fi, Laundry Facilities and Trash, Full hook-up.
